channel.title: cloud run on Home
channel.description: Recent content in cloud run on Home

item.title: How to deploy a cloud run application using Gitlab CI/CD
item.description: In Google Cloud Next 2019, they introduced a new product called [Cloud Run] (https://cloud.google.com/run/). I’ve been using it from the EAP (Early Access Program) days. [As the name suggests, basically it runs your docker image. You might be familiar with other serverless products such as [Cloud Function] (https://cloud.google.com/functions/) or [lambda] (https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/) where you provide your source code instead of a docker image. In my opinion, Cloud Run is more flexible than functions.
